Articles.Content:
Gambles it all away.

Sucker Hill.

A led zeppelin falls on it.

[Sucker Punch](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sucker_Punch_%282011_film%29)
The William Hill gets his dill and escapes from the hill. The hill now belongs to the Kraken, because the .craft was unstable so one one can get up on it again (unless you are a developer of KSP).
Kraken Sanctuary Hill

Hacks the source code

python hill

Harry defeats the python.

Hogwarts Hill.

Anaconda has eaten the hog to revenge for the python.

Snakewarts Hill.

All the warts get frozen

Cold Blooded Hill.

Except the frost-protected ones.

Antifreeze Hill

Kept warm with hot chocolate.

Chocolate lava volcano Hill.

The volcano emits light.

Chocolate Lava Lamp Hill

The chocoholics attack.

Delicious Crater.

Eats the chocolates

yum hill

They found a city.

Yuma Hill.

Spelling correction.

Your Mum Hill.

Bad joke hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-12-01T01:47:03Z" title="12/01/2021 01:47  AM" data-short="2 yr">December 1, 2021</time> by Kerb24**

I instruct my kerbals to create a small mound of dust on Mün. They plant a toothpick sized flag with Wizard Aerospace’s logo. My kerbals move back into the Münbase and admire their work.  

(It has a little smiley face, that’s why I use Ü)

My mound of dust!
